name: Gerber Gator Combo Axe II
description: Some combination gizmos make you scratch your head and wonder, “What were they thinking?” This one makes you wonder, “What took them so long?” This axe has a wood saw in the handle to save space in your pack.Forged steel head for excellent edge retention.Durable glass filled nylon handle, with a rubber grip for comfort and control.Stainless steel saw with a 16cm (6in.) blade secures inside the handle magnetically.Ballistic nylon sheath with belt loop.Overall Length is 38.6cm (15¼in.).
